chapter.title: Download Oxygen Author
chapter.para: Download Oxygen Author from the following link:Â
On the web start page, click the appropriate link to launch the Rackspace/OpenStack edition of SyncRO Soft's <oXygen/> XML Editor or Author.
Use the editor to edit RackBook documents and WADL files.
The total size of the Java web start bundle is about 87 MBs. When you run the application for the first time, Java Web Start downloads the entire package, which contains 15 jar files.

When you launch the application again in the future, JWS check only for modified jar files (an upgrade) and downloads them if necessary. If no new jars are found or network connectivity is not available, the application starts immediately. Press "Start" when the Java TM Web Start finishes the download. Once the application launches, you must supply a valid oXygen Editor or Author license. Run <oXygen/> Author: Appropriate for editing Rackbook (DocBook) documents and WADL files. Run <oXygen/> Editor: Appropriate for editing Rackbook (DocBook) documents and WADL files. Also includes XSD and XSLT-related features. The download should only take a few minutes on a reasonably fast connection.
If you install oXygen through JWS and then add oXygen plugins to that installation, those plugins are removed when oXygen is updated.
